title: Blended Learning-Based Advanced Language Simulation Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and digital environment proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining traditional classroom instruction with online VR simulations. Students engage in interactive learning activities by experiencing real-world language use scenarios in virtual reality

learning_goals: Learners can engage in natural conversations in the target language for over 15 minutes in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can integrate online and offline materials in a blended learning environment to complete language projects (presentations, reports, etc.).
Learners can analyze and visualize language learning data using digital tools and improve learning strategies accordingly.

resources: VR Headset and Motion Controller Set

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
